data.comment: The match has started.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Leon.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Felipe Pardo for Pachuca who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 4, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pachuca's Victor Davila is on target but unsuccessful.
Pachucaâ€™s Felipe Pardo is on his feet again at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Victor Davila (Pachuca) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Pachuca.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Free kick Pachuca.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 14, Leon have a goal kick.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
In the minute 19, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Luis Montes for Leon has been booked by Eduardo Galvan Basulto and receives a first yellow card.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 22, Leon have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Leon's Joel Campbell gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pachuca.
Pachuca push forward at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo and Gustavo Cabral gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leon defence.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 26, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Leon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Leon.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Leon.
Leon drives forward and Joel Campbell gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 33, Pachuca push upfield but Eduardo Galvan Basulto quickly pulls them for offside.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In the minute 41, Can Pachuca capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Pachuca de Soto Pachuca attack through Luis Chavez. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Jean Meneses of Leon gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pachuca de Soto.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 47, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Pachuca throw-in in Leon's half.
Can Leon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pachuca's half?
In the minute 52, Leon have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 54, Joel Campbell for Leon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Leon.
At Estadio Miguel Hidalgo, Jose Rodriguez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Leon.
Fernando Navarro is on a sub for Emanuel Gigliotti for Leon.
Free kick Leon.
In the minute 62, In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The home team have replaced Roberto de la Rosa with Victor Sosa. This is the first substitution made today by Paulo Pezzolano.
Leon's Luis Montes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 64, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In Pachuca de Soto, Jean Meneses of Leon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 70, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Yairo Moreno.
Jean Meneses with an assist there.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the home team in Pachuca de Soto.
Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a third substitution, with Josue Gomez Del Rosal replacing Luis Chavez.
Emmanuel Garcia is replacing Jorge Hernandez for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 75, Leon's Joel Campbell breaks free at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 75, Emmanuel Garcia (Pachuca) gets a yellow card.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Leon.
Marcos Ignacio Ambriz is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo with Andres Mosquera replacing Stiven Barreiro.
In the minute 78, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Jean Meneses (Leon) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto blows against Leon's Fernando Navarro for offside.
In the minute 80, Free kick Pachuca.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Kevin Alvarez (Pachuca) has received a yellow card from Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 82, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a throw-in for Leon, close to Pachuca's area.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 87, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
Roberto Nurse is replacing Kevin Alvarez for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
The away team replace Osvaldo Rodriguez with Pedro Aquino.
In the minute 89, In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pachuca.
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Free kick Pachuca.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Felipe Pardo (Pachuca) has been shown a straight red card by referee Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
